捉.definition: to clutch; to grab; to capture

捉住.definition: to catch; to grapple with; to hold onto

捉姦.definition: to catch a couple in the act (adultery, illicit sexual relations)

捉急.definition: humorous pronunciation of 著急|着急[zhao2 ji2]

捉拿.definition: to arrest; to catch a criminal

捉捕.definition: to arrest; to seize; to capture

捉摸.definition: to fathom; to make sense of; to grasp

捉摸不定.definition: (idiom) unpredictable; elusive; hard to pin down

捉襟見肘.definition: lit. pulling on the lapels exposes the elbows (idiom); strapped for cash; unable to make ends meet
